text.content: Introduction

rich_text.plain_text: Introduction

text.content: As Zoom's global assistant, AI Companion provides support throughout the user's work process. It intelligently identifies user needs, seamlessly connects various work scenarios, and helps complete tasks ranging from simple to complex multi-step processes, improving work efficiency and quality.

rich_text.plain_text: As Zoom's global assistant, AI Companion provides support throughout the user's work process. It intelligently identifies user needs, seamlessly connects various work scenarios, and helps complete tasks ranging from simple to complex multi-step processes, improving work efficiency and quality.

text.content: User jobs and problems

rich_text.plain_text: User jobs and problems

text.content: Through deep integration with AI Companion, Zoom Docs not only helps users collaboratively create and read documents, conduct in-depth discussions and research, but also specifically helps users understand content and supports broader inquiries or deep complex tasks, including:

rich_text.plain_text: Through deep integration with AI Companion, Zoom Docs not only helps users collaboratively create and read documents, conduct in-depth discussions and research, but also specifically helps users understand content and supports broader inquiries or deep complex tasks, including:

text.content: Thinking

rich_text.plain_text: Thinking

text.content: Exploring from the perspective of "AI and user interaction methods," I've roughly categorized AI interaction models in common user scenarios into three types:

rich_text.plain_text: Exploring from the perspective of "AI and user interaction methods," I've roughly categorized AI interaction models in common user scenarios into three types:

text.content: AI Companion's main interaction form is pattern 3, featuring multiple conversational interactions. Its global independent form offers the following advantages:

rich_text.plain_text: AI Companion's main interaction form is pattern 3, featuring multiple conversational interactions. Its global independent form offers the following advantages:

text.content: Larger space, stable position, suitable for long-term interaction, multiple conversations, and immersive operations;

rich_text.plain_text: Larger space, stable position, suitable for long-term interaction, multiple conversations, and immersive operations;

text.content: Independent from the creation space, allowing side-by-side content review;

rich_text.plain_text: Independent from the creation space, allowing side-by-side content review;

text.content: Convenient for displaying data calls and analysis from multiple sources, as well as tracking multi-step tasks.

rich_text.plain_text: Convenient for displaying data calls and analysis from multiple sources, as well as tracking multi-step tasks.

text.content: Contextual AI tools

rich_text.plain_text: Contextual AI tools

text.content: , Ask AI Companion is well-suited for handling more complex tasks or inquiries that require in-depth communication in Docs scenarios.

text.content: Goals

rich_text.plain_text: Goals

text.content: Solution

rich_text.plain_text: Solution

text.content: In the first version, we prioritize using AI Companion to provide contextualized support for Zoom Docs' basic scenarios, including content creation, understanding content, Q&A, document creation, and more.

rich_text.plain_text: In the first version, we prioritize using AI Companion to provide contextualized support for Zoom Docs' basic scenarios, including content creation, understanding content, Q&A, document creation, and more.

text.content: 1. Contextual guidance, one-click completion of high-frequency tasks

rich_text.plain_text: 1. Contextual guidance, one-click completion of high-frequency tasks

text.content: In blank document state, creation and exploration guidance is provided by default

rich_text.plain_text: In blank document state, creation and exploration guidance is provided by default

text.content: For documents with content, summaries, key issues, and content improvement guidance are provided by default

rich_text.plain_text: For documents with content, summaries, key issues, and content improvement guidance are provided by default

text.content: After selecting certain content, you can click the recommended prompt area at the bottom of the conversation to quickly perform high-frequency operations such as content explanation and optimization

rich_text.plain_text: After selecting certain content, you can click the recommended prompt area at the bottom of the conversation to quickly perform high-frequency operations such as content explanation and optimization

text.content: 2. Reference existing data or files

rich_text.plain_text: 2. Reference existing data or files

text.content: When describing requests, reference Zoom Meetings, Files, or Docs as context to improve information efficiency

rich_text.plain_text: When describing requests, reference Zoom Meetings, Files, or Docs as context to improve information efficiency

text.content: 3. Communication and utilization of results

rich_text.plain_text: 3. Communication and utilization of results

text.content: Clearly display referenced original text in the conversation for easy tracing; highlight operational actions for results and provide next-step suggestions

rich_text.plain_text: Clearly display referenced original text in the conversation for easy tracing; highlight operational actions for results and provide next-step suggestions

text.content: 4. Clear tracing of information sources

rich_text.plain_text: 4. Clear tracing of information sources

text.content: For Q&A or Summarize scenarios, display referenced content in the results, click to jump to the corresponding position in the text, or open other documents for further reading

rich_text.plain_text: For Q&A or Summarize scenarios, display referenced content in the results, click to jump to the corresponding position in the text, or open other documents for further reading

text.content: 5. Quiet transitions between scenarios

rich_text.plain_text: 5. Quiet transitions between scenarios

text.content: After users communicate with AI Companion in other scenarios such as Calendar or Meetings, when switching to Docs, existing chats won't be forcibly closed or switched to prevent loss of position awareness, giving users the initiative to "continue conversation" or "start a new conversation"; if users want to explore tasks for the current document, they can open the prompt center for quick selection or manually input requests

rich_text.plain_text: After users communicate with AI Companion in other scenarios such as Calendar or Meetings, when switching to Docs, existing chats won't be forcibly closed or switched to prevent loss of position awareness, giving users the initiative to "continue conversation" or "start a new conversation"; if users want to explore tasks for the current document, they can open the prompt center for quick selection or manually input requests

text.content: More flexible context range specification

rich_text.plain_text: More flexible context range specification

text.content: The context range for user inquiries may include: current document, user-selected content, other documents, team knowledge base, user data from Zoom's Meeting, Chat, Calendar and other scenarios, general inquiries without specific targets, online network data, etc.

rich_text.plain_text: The context range for user inquiries may include: current document, user-selected content, other documents, team knowledge base, user data from Zoom's Meeting, Chat, Calendar and other scenarios, general inquiries without specific targets, online network data, etc.

text.content: Before and after generating results, users can manually specify context range; if unsatisfied with results, they can specify other ranges to retry the inquiry

rich_text.plain_text: Before and after generating results, users can manually specify context range; if unsatisfied with results, they can specify other ranges to retry the inquiry

text.content: A casual inquiry or an in-depth Q&A? The choice is yours.

rich_text.plain_text: A casual inquiry or an in-depth Q&A? The choice is yours.

text.content: Two forms can be freely switched: floating mode for immersive writing, switching to fixed right-side mode when deeper communication is needed
